evidence.claim: SeniorDoc utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance for managing patient data.
SeniorDoc supports FHIR standard for healthcare data interoperability.
Integration with X12 EDI for health insurance transactions is detailed in case studies.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 EDI in health tech with relevant APIs and integration patterns for claims and eligibility.
